author: Special Correspondent
text:
Posters of the Narada News sting operation were seen in Kolkata on Sunday.— Photo: Special Arrangement

Nearly a week after the sting operation of Narada News, West Bengal on Sunday morning saw huge posters depicting photographs of Trinamool Congress leaders allegedly accepting cash in the video footage. The posters, seen at key intersections in the city, bore a photograph of party chairperson and Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee and carried provocative captions.

The posters did not disclose the identity of those who put them up. However, city police removed them within minutes after they were seen. Locals said they may have been pasted at night.
title: Anonymous posters of sting spring a surprise
